title:
Komik

alternative_titles: Lá thư gửi tới chàng trai 17 tuổi, To you at 17th, 17歳のキミへ
author: Kira Ito
synopsis:
Manga                    17 Sai no Kimi e yang dibuat oleh komikus bernama
                    Kira Ito ini bercerita tentang
                    A mysterious high school girl appeared and sent letters to Mirai
